actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the voting interests of disqualified persons to be taken into account in determining a private foundation's voting interest for purposes of section 4943 of such Code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the voting interest of disqualified persons to be taken into account in determining a private foundation's voting interest in a business enterprise for purposes of the penalty tax on excess business holdings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the voting interests of disqualified persons to be taken into account in determining a private foundation's voting interest for purposes of section 4943 of such Code.
